Vast Challenge - MC 2

Overview

shinyApp(
  ui <- fluidPage(
    titlePanel("Oceanus Data Visualization"),
    tabsetPanel(
      tabPanel("Interactive Map",
               fluidRow(
                 column(width = 2,
                        h3("Interactive Map Filters"),
                        selectInput("filter_type", "Select Filter Type:", 
                                    choices = c("All", "Fishing Ground", "City", "Island", 
                                                "Buoy (Navigation)", "Buoy (Fishing)"), 
                                    selected = "All"),
                        selectizeInput("selected_name", "Select Area:", 
                                       choices = c("All"), multiple = TRUE, 
                                       selected = c("All")),
                        selectizeInput("fish_species", "Select Fish Species:", 
                                       choices = c("All", unique_fish_species), multiple = TRUE, 
                                       selected = "All"),
                        selectizeInput("activities", "Select Activities:", 
                                       choices = unique_activities, multiple = TRUE, selected = NULL)
                 ),
                 column(width = 10,
                        h3("Interactive Map"),
                        plotOutput("mapPlot", height = "600px")
                 )
               )
      ),
      tabPanel("Vessel Count",
               fluidRow(
                 column(width = 2,
                        h3("Vessel Count Filters"),
                        selectizeInput("selected_areas", "Select Areas:", 
                                       choices = NULL, 
                                       selected = c("City of Haacklee", "City of Lomark", "City of Himark", "City of Paackland", "City of South Paackland"), 
                                       multiple = TRUE),
                        h4("Vessel Type Color Legend", style = "font-size: 10px;"),
                        lapply(names(vessel_colors), function(type) {
                          div(style = sprintf("background-color:%s; color: black; font-size: 10px; padding: 5px;", vessel_colors[[type]]),
                              type)
                        })
                 ),
                 column(width = 10,
                        h3("Unique Vessels per Area"),
                        plotOutput("vesselPlot", height = "600px")
                 )
               )
      ),
      tabPanel("Cargo Quantity",
               fluidRow(
                 column(width = 2,
                        h3("Cargo Quantity Filters"),
                        selectizeInput("port", "Select Destination Port:", 
                                       choices = c("All Ports", unique(tx_qty$dest)), 
                                       selected = "All Ports", multiple = TRUE),
                        selectizeInput("species", "Select Fish Species:", 
                                       choices = c("All Species", unique(tx_qty$fish_species)), 
                                       selected = "All Species"),
                        h4("Fish Species Color Code", style = "font-size: 10px;"),
                        lapply(names(fish_species_color), function(species) {
                          div(style = sprintf("background-color:%s; color: black; font-size: 10px; padding: 5px;", fish_species_color[[species]]),
                              species)
                        })
                 ),
                 column(width = 10,
                        h3("Total Quantity of Cargo per Destination Port"),
                        plotOutput("barPlot", height = "600px")
                 )
               )
      ),
      tabPanel("Breakdown on Routes most travelled",
               fluidPage(
                 titlePanel("Most Frequent Unique Areas Visited"),
                 sidebarLayout(
                   sidebarPanel(
                     dateRangeInput("date_range", 
                                    label = "Select Date Range",
                                    start = min(time_summary_df$start_date),
                                    end = max(time_summary_df$end_date)),
                     selectInput("start_city", 
                                 label = "Select Start City",
                                 choices = c("All", unique(time_summary_df$start_city)),
                                 selected = "All"),
                     selectInput("end_city", 
                                 label = "Select End City",
                                 choices = c("All", unique(time_summary_df$end_city)),
                                 selected = "All"),
                     selectInput("specific_area", 
                                 label = "Select Specific Area",
                                 choices = c("All", unique(unlist(strsplit(time_summary_df$unique_areas, ", ")))),
                                 selected = "All",
                                 multiple = TRUE),
                     selectInput("vessel_company", 
                                 label = "Select Vessel Company",
                                 choices = c("All", unique(time_summary_df$vessel_company)),
                                 selected = "All"),
                     textOutput("unique_vessels"),
                     textOutput("total_trips")
                   ),
                   mainPanel(
                     plotOutput("areaPlot"),
                     tableOutput("summaryTable")
                   )
                 )
               )
      )
    )
  ),
  
  server <- function(input, output, session) {
    # Geography Plot
    OceanusGeography <- OceanusGeography %>%
      mutate(Activities = str_replace_all(Activities, 'c\\(|"|\\)', '')) %>%
      mutate(Activities = str_split(Activities, ', '))
    
    filteredData <- reactive({
      data <- OceanusGeography
      
      if (input$filter_type == "Fishing Ground") {
        data <- data %>% filter(X.Kind == "Fishing Ground")
      } else if (input$filter_type == "City") {
        data <- data %>% filter(X.Kind == "city")
      } else if (input$filter_type == "Island") {
        data <- data %>% filter(X.Kind == "Island")
      } else if (input$filter_type == "Buoy (Navigation)") {
        data <- data %>% filter(X.Kind == "buoy" & Activities == "Navigation")
      } else if (input$filter_type == "Buoy (Fishing)") {
        data <- data %>% filter(X.Kind == "buoy" & grepl("fishing", Activities, ignore.case = TRUE))
      }
      
      if (!is.null(input$fish_species) && "All" %in% input$fish_species == FALSE) {
        data <- data %>% filter(grepl(paste(input$fish_species, collapse = "|"), fish_species_present))
      }
      
      if (!is.null(input$activities) && length(input$activities) > 0) {
        data <- data %>% filter(map_lgl(Activities, ~ any(. %in% input$activities)))
      }
      
      data
    })
    
    observe({
      selected_names <- unique(filteredData()$Name)
      default_selections <- c("Himark", "Paackland", "Lomark", "Paacklee", "South Paacklee")
      
      updateSelectizeInput(session, "selected_name",
                           choices = c("All", unique(c(selected_names, default_selections))),
                           selected = input$selected_name)
    })
    
    highlightedData <- reactive({
      if ("All" %in% input$selected_name) {
        filteredData()
      } else {
        filteredData() %>% filter(Name %in% input$selected_name)
      }
    })
    
    output$mapPlot <- renderPlot({
      plotData <- if ("All" %in% input$selected_name) {
        filteredData()
      } else {
        highlightedData()
      }
      
      ggplot() +
        geom_sf(data = OceanusGeography, fill = NA, color = "black", alpha = 0.5) +
        geom_sf(data = OceanusGeography, aes(fill = X.Kind), alpha = 0.3) +
        geom_sf(data = highlightedData(), aes(fill = X.Kind), color = "red", size = 1) +
        geom_text_repel(data = plotData, aes(label = Name, geometry = geometry), 
                        stat = "sf_coordinates", size = 3) +
        theme_minimal() +
        scale_fill_manual(values = c("Island" = "beige", "Fishing Ground" = "lightblue", 
                                     "Ecological Preserve" = "lightgreen", "city" = "purple", "buoy" = "darkblue")) +
        labs(title = "Map of Oceanus", 
             x = "Longitude", y = "Latitude", fill = "Type")
    })
    
    # Cargo Quantity Plot
    output$barPlot <- renderPlot({
      if (!is.null(input$port) && "All Ports" %in% input$port == FALSE) {
        filtered_data <- tx_qty %>% filter(dest %in% input$port)
      } else {
        filtered_data <- tx_qty
      }
      
      if (!is.null(input$species) && "All Species" %in% input$species == FALSE) {
        filtered_data <- filtered_data %>% filter(fish_species %in% input$species)
      }
      
      df_agg <- filtered_data %>% group_by(dest, fish_species) %>% summarize(qty_tons = sum(qty_tons))
      
      ggplot(data = df_agg, aes(x = dest, y = qty_tons, fill = fish_species)) +
        geom_bar(stat = "identity") +
        scale_fill_manual(values = fish_species_color) +
        geom_text(aes(label = round(qty_tons, 2)), position = position_stack(vjust = 0.5), size = 3) +
        labs(title = "Total Quantity of Cargo per Destination Port",
             x = "Destination Port", y = "Total Quantity (tons)") +
        theme_minimal() +
        theme(legend.position = "none")
    })
    
    # Vessel Count Plot
    observe({
      updateSelectizeInput(session, "selected_areas",
                           choices = unique(ping_activity$area),
                           selected = c("City of Haacklee", "City of Lomark", "City of Himark", "City of Paackland", "City of South Paackland"))
    })
    
    filtered_data <- reactive({
      if (is.null(input$selected_areas)) {
        ping_activity
      } else {
        ping_activity %>% filter(area %in% input$selected_areas)
      }
    })
    
    data_processed <- reactive({
      filtered_data() %>%
        mutate(area = case_when(
          area == "City of Haacklee" ~ "Haacklee",
          area == "City of Lomark" ~ "Lomark",
          area == "City of Himark" ~ "Himark",
          area == "City of Paackland" ~ "Paackland",
          area == "City of South Paackland" ~ "South Paackland",
          TRUE ~ area
        )) %>%
        group_by(area, vessel_type) %>%
        summarise(unique_vessels = n_distinct(vessel_id)) %>%
        ungroup()
    })
    
    output$vesselPlot <- renderPlot({
      plot_data <- data_processed()
      ggplot(plot_data, aes(x = area, y = unique_vessels, fill = vessel_type)) +
        geom_bar(stat = "identity") +
        scale_fill_manual(values = vessel_colors) +
        geom_text(data = plot_data %>% filter(vessel_type %in% c("Fishing", "Cargo_Vessel")),
                  aes(label = unique_vessels), position = position_stack(vjust = 0.5), size = 3) +
        labs(title = "Unique Vessels per Area",
             x = "Area",
             y = "Count of Unique Vessels") +
        theme_minimal() +
        theme(axis.text.x = element_text(hjust = 1),
              legend.position = "none")
    })
    
    # Breakdown on Routes most travelled Plot
    filtered_data_routes <- reactive({
      data <- time_summary_df %>%
        filter(start_date >= input$date_range[1] & end_date <= input$date_range[2])
      
      if (input$start_city != "All") {
        data <- data %>% filter(start_city == input$start_city)
      }
      
      if (input$end_city != "All") {
        data <- data %>% filter(end_city == input$end_city)
      }
      
      if (input$vessel_company != "All") {
        data <- data %>% filter(vessel_company == input$vessel_company)
      }
      
      if ("All" %in% input$specific_area) {
        data
      } else {
        data %>% filter(sapply(strsplit(unique_areas_cleaned, ", "), function(x) any(input$specific_area %in% x)))
      }
    })
    
    area_summary <- reactive({
      filtered_data_routes() %>%
        group_by(unique_areas_cleaned) %>%
        summarise(
          unique_vessels = n_distinct(vessel_id),
          total_trips = n()
        ) %>%
        arrange(desc(total_trips)) %>%
        head(10)
    })
    
    output$unique_vessels <- renderText({
      paste("Count of unique vessels:", n_distinct(filtered_data_routes()$vessel_id))
    })
    
    output$total_trips <- renderText({
      paste("Total count of trips:", nrow(filtered_data_routes()))
    })
    
    output$areaPlot <- renderPlot({
      ggplot(area_summary(), aes(x = reorder(unique_areas_cleaned, total_trips), y = total_trips)) +
        geom_bar(stat = "identity", fill = 'skyblue') +
        coord_flip() +
        labs(title = "Most Frequent Unique Areas Visited",
             x = "Unique Areas",
             y = "Total Trips") +
        theme_minimal()
    })
    
    output$summaryTable <- renderTable({
      top_route <- area_summary() %>%
        slice(1) %>%
        pull(unique_areas_cleaned)
      
      filtered_data_routes() %>%
        filter(unique_areas_cleaned == top_route) %>%
        group_by(vessel_id, vessel_company, vessel_type) %>%
        summarise(trips = n()) %>%
        arrange(desc(trips)) %>%
        head(10)
    })
  }
)

South Seafood Express

ping_activity <- ping_activity %>%
  mutate(area = gsub("^City of", "", area)) %>%
  mutate(area = gsub("^\\s+", "", area))

# combining location coordinates with ping activity
ping_activity <- ping_activity %>%
  left_join(OceanusLocations_df %>% select(c("Name", "XCOORD", "YCOORD")),
            by = c("area" = "Name"))

# convert dataframe into point data.frame with x and y coords.

vessel_movement_sf <- ping_activity %>%
  st_as_sf(coords = c("XCOORD", "YCOORD"), 
           crs = 4326)

vessel_movement_sf <- vessel_movement_sf %>%
  arrange(vessel_id, start_time)

#write_csv(vessel_movement_sf, "data/vessel_movement.csv")

# Getting median dwell time statistics 
vessel_movement_sf$start_time <- as.POSIXct(vessel_movement_sf$start_time, format="%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ")

vessel_movement_sf <- vessel_movement_sf %>%
  group_by(vessel_id, area, geometry) %>%
  summarise(median_dwell_time = median(dwell, na.rm = TRUE)) %>%
  ungroup()
`summarise()` has grouped output by 'vessel_id', 'area'. You can override using
the `.groups` argument.
# to include filter for start time - period of interest


# Allocating location groups

group_mapping <- list(
  "City" = c("Haacklee", "Himark", "Lomark", "Paackland", "South Paackland", "Port Grove"),
  "Navigation" = c("Nav 1", "Nav 2", "Nav 3", "Nav A", "Nav B", "Nav C", "Nav D", "Nav E"),
  "FishingGround" = c("Cod Table", "Tuna Shelf", "Wrasse Beds"),
  "Buoy(Fishing)" = c("Exit East", "Exit South", "Exit North", "Exit West"),
  "EcologicalPreserve" = c("Ghoti Preserve", "Nemo Reef", "Don Limpet Preserve")
)

# Add a column for the group in the dataframe
vessel_movement_sf <- vessel_movement_sf %>%
  mutate(group = case_when(
    area %in% group_mapping$City ~ "City",
    area %in% group_mapping$Navigation ~ "Navigation",
    area %in% group_mapping$FishingGround ~ "FishingGround",
    area %in% group_mapping$`Buoy(Fishing)` ~ "Buoy(Fishing)",
    area %in% group_mapping$EcologicalPreserve ~ "EcologicalPreserve",
    TRUE ~ "Other"
  ))


vessel_trajectory <- vessel_movement_sf %>%
  group_by(vessel_id) %>%
  summarize(do_union = FALSE) %>%
  st_cast("LINESTRING")

kind_colors <- c(
  "Island" = "beige", 
  "Fishing Ground" = "lightblue", 
  "Ecological Preserve" = "lightgreen", 
  "City" = "purple", 
  "Buoy(Fishing)" = "blue"
)

# UI for the Shiny app
shinyApp( ui <- fluidPage(
  titlePanel("Vessel Movement and Median Dwell Time at Locations"),
  sidebarLayout(
    sidebarPanel(
      selectInput("vessel", "Select Vessel", choices = unique(vessel_movement_sf$vessel_id), selected = "roachrobberdb6"),
      sliderInput("percentile", "Select Percentile for Box Plot", min = 90, max = 100, value = 90, step = 1)
    ),
    mainPanel(
      tabsetPanel(
        tabPanel("Route Taken", 
                 plotOutput("trajectoryPlot", height = "600px")
        ),
        tabPanel("Dwell Time on Map", 
                 plotOutput("mapPlot", height = "600px")
        ),
        tabPanel("Cities, Fishing Ground, Preserve", 
                 plotOutput("group1Plot", height = "600px")
        ),
        tabPanel("Navigation & Fishing Buoy", 
                 plotOutput("group2Plot", height = "600px")
        )
      )
    )
  )
) , 

# Server logic for the Shiny app
server <- function(input, output) {
  filteredData <- reactive({
    vessel_movement_sf %>% filter(vessel_id == input$vessel)
  })
  
  percentileFilteredData <- reactive({
    percent <- input$percentile / 100
    otherData <- vessel_movement_sf %>% filter(vessel_id != input$vessel)
    
    lower_bound <- otherData %>% 
      st_set_geometry(NULL) %>% # Temporarily remove geometry for quantile calculation
      group_by(area) %>% 
      summarise(lower = quantile(median_dwell_time, (1 - percent) / 2, na.rm = TRUE))
    
    upper_bound <- otherData %>% 
      st_set_geometry(NULL) %>% # Temporarily remove geometry for quantile calculation
      group_by(area) %>% 
      summarise(upper = quantile(median_dwell_time, 1 - (1 - percent) / 2, na.rm = TRUE))
    
    filtered_otherData <- otherData %>%
      left_join(lower_bound, by = "area") %>%
      left_join(upper_bound, by = "area") %>%
      filter(!is.na(median_dwell_time) & median_dwell_time != "", 
             median_dwell_time >= lower & median_dwell_time <= upper) %>%
      st_as_sf() # Convert back to sf object if needed
    
    return(filtered_otherData)
  })
  
  vessel_trajectory_selected <- reactive({
    vessel_trajectory <- vessel_movement_sf %>%
      group_by(vessel_id) %>%
      summarize(do_union = FALSE) %>%
      st_cast("LINESTRING")
    
    vessel_trajectory %>% filter(vessel_id == input$vessel)
  })
  
  output$trajectoryPlot <- renderPlot({
    plotData <- filteredData()
    trajectoryData <- vessel_trajectory_selected()
    
    ggplot() +
      geom_sf(data = OceanusGeography, fill = NA, color = "black", alpha = 0.5) +
      geom_sf(data = OceanusGeography, aes(fill = X.Kind), alpha = 0.3) + 
      scale_fill_manual(values = kind_colors) +
      geom_sf(data = trajectoryData, 
              aes(color = "red"), 
              size = 1) +
      geom_text(data = OceanusLocations_df, 
                aes(x = XCOORD, y = YCOORD, label = Name), 
                size = 2, hjust = 1, vjust = 1) +
      theme_minimal() +
      labs(title = "Trajectories of Selected Vessel", 
           x = "Longitude", y = "Latitude", color = "Vessel ID")
  })
  
  output$mapPlot <- renderPlot({
    plotData <- filteredData()
    
    ggplot() +
      geom_sf(data = OceanusGeography, fill = NA, color = "black", alpha = 0.5) +
      geom_sf(data = OceanusGeography, aes(fill = X.Kind), alpha = 0.3) +
      geom_point(data = plotData, aes(x = st_coordinates(geometry)[,1], y = st_coordinates(geometry)[,2], size = median_dwell_time), color = "red", alpha = 0.5) +
      geom_text_repel(data = plotData, aes(x = st_coordinates(geometry)[,1], y = st_coordinates(geometry)[,2], label = area), size = 3) +
      theme_minimal() +
      scale_fill_manual(values = kind_colors) +
      labs(title = "Map of Oceanus", x = "Longitude", y = "Latitude", fill = "Type") +
      theme(aspect.ratio = 1) # Ensure square aspect ratio for map
  })
  
  output$group1Plot <- renderPlot({
    plotData <- filteredData()
    filteredOtherData <- percentileFilteredData()
    
    # Filter data for group 1
    group1Data <- filteredOtherData %>% filter(area %in% unlist(group_mapping[c("City", "FishingGround", "EcologicalPreserve")]))
    
    ggplot() +
      geom_rect(aes(xmin = -Inf, xmax = Inf, ymin = -Inf, ymax = Inf), fill = NA) +
      geom_rect(aes(xmin = -Inf, xmax = 6.5, ymin = -Inf, ymax = Inf), fill = "beige", alpha = 0.5) +
      geom_rect(aes(xmin = 6.5, xmax = 9.5, ymin = -Inf, ymax = Inf), fill = "lightblue", alpha = 0.5) +
      geom_rect(aes(xmin = 9.5, xmax = Inf, ymin = -Inf, ymax = Inf), fill = "lightgreen", alpha = 0.5) +
      geom_boxplot(data = group1Data, aes(x = factor(area, levels = unlist(group_mapping[c("City", "FishingGround", "EcologicalPreserve")])), y = median_dwell_time), outlier.shape = NA, fill = "grey", alpha = 0.5) +
      geom_jitter(data = group1Data, aes(x = factor(area, levels = unlist(group_mapping[c("City", "FishingGround", "EcologicalPreserve")])), y = median_dwell_time), width = 0.2, alpha = 0.5) +
      geom_point(data = plotData %>% filter(area %in% unlist(group_mapping[c("City", "FishingGround", "EcologicalPreserve")])), aes(x = factor(area, levels = unlist(group_mapping[c("City", "FishingGround", "EcologicalPreserve")])), y = median_dwell_time), color = "red", size = 3) +
      annotate("text", x = 3.5, y = Inf, label = "City", vjust = 1.5) +
      annotate("text", x = 8, y = Inf, label = "Fishing Ground", vjust = 1.5) +
      annotate("text", x = 11.5, y = Inf, label = "Ecological Preserve", vjust = 1.5) +
      theme_minimal() +
      labs(title = "Median Dwell Time at City, Fishing Grounds, and Ecological Preserves", x = "Location", y = "Median Dwell Time") +
      theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 45, hjust = 1)) # Rotate x-axis labels for better readability
  })
  
  output$group2Plot <- renderPlot({
    plotData <- filteredData()
    filteredOtherData <- percentileFilteredData()
    
    # Filter data for group 2
    group2Data <- filteredOtherData %>% filter(area %in% unlist(group_mapping[c("Navigation", "Buoy(Fishing)")]))
    
    ggplot() +
      geom_rect(aes(xmin = -Inf, xmax = Inf, ymin = -Inf, ymax = Inf), fill = NA) +
      geom_rect(aes(xmin = -Inf, xmax = 8.5, ymin = -Inf, ymax = Inf), fill = "lightgrey", alpha = 0.5) +
      geom_rect(aes(xmin = 8.5, xmax = Inf, ymin = -Inf, ymax = Inf), fill = "darkblue", alpha = 0.5) +
      geom_boxplot(data = group2Data, aes(x = factor(area, levels = unlist(group_mapping[c("Navigation", "Buoy(Fishing)")])), y = median_dwell_time), outlier.shape = NA, fill = "grey", alpha = 0.5) +
      geom_jitter(data = group2Data, aes(x = factor(area, levels = unlist(group_mapping[c("Navigation", "Buoy(Fishing)")])), y = median_dwell_time), width = 0.2, alpha = 0.5) +
      geom_point(data = plotData %>% filter(area %in% unlist(group_mapping[c("Navigation", "Buoy(Fishing)")])), aes(x = factor(area, levels = unlist(group_mapping[c("Navigation", "Buoy(Fishing)")])), y = median_dwell_time), color = "red", size = 3) +
      annotate("text", x = 4.25, y = Inf, label = "Navigation", vjust = 1.5) +
      annotate("text", x = 10.25, y = Inf, label = "Buoy Fishing", vjust = 1.5) +
      theme_minimal() +
      labs(title = "Median Dwell Time at Navigation and Buoy Fishing Areas", x = "Location", y = "Median Dwell Time") +
      theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 45, hjust = 1)) # Rotate x-axis labels for better readability
  })
}
)

Seasonality & Suspicious Vessel

tx_qty <- read_csv("data/tx_qty.csv")
Rows: 5307 Columns: 9
 Column specification 
Delimiter: ","
chr  (4): last_edited_by, cargo_id, dest, fish_species
dbl  (1): qty_tons
dttm (3): date_added, last_edited_date, tx_date
date (1): deliver_date

 Use `spec()` to retrieve the full column specification for this data.
 Specify the column types or set `show_col_types = FALSE` to quiet this message.
tx_qty_2035 <- tx_qty %>%
  mutate(date = as.Date(format(tx_date, "%Y-%m-%d")))

# Prepare Cargo Count Data
all_dates_cargo <- seq(min(tx_qty_2035$date), max(tx_qty_2035$date), by = "day")
all_dests <- unique(tx_qty_2035$dest)
complete_grid_cargo <- expand.grid(date = all_dates_cargo, dest = all_dests)

agg_data_cargo <- tx_qty_2035 %>%
  group_by(dest, date) %>%
  summarise(count_distinct_cargo = n_distinct(cargo_id)) %>%
  ungroup()
`summarise()` has grouped output by 'dest'. You can override using the
`.groups` argument.
agg_data_cargo <- complete_grid_cargo %>%
  left_join(agg_data_cargo, by = c("date", "dest")) %>%
  replace_na(list(count_distinct_cargo = 0))

agg_data_cargo <- agg_data_cargo %>%
  mutate(month = month(date, label = TRUE, abbr = TRUE),
         week = week(date),
         weekday = wday(date, label = TRUE, abbr = TRUE, week_start = 7))

# Prepare Vessel Count Data
E_Hbrpt_v <- E_Hbrpt_v %>%
  mutate(date = as.Date(format(as.POSIXct(arr_date, format="%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ"), "%Y-%m-%d")))

all_dates_vessel <- seq(min(E_Hbrpt_v$date), max(E_Hbrpt_v$date), by = "day")
all_ports <- unique(E_Hbrpt_v$port)
complete_grid_vessel <- expand.grid(date = all_dates_vessel, port = all_ports)

agg_data_vessel <- E_Hbrpt_v %>%
  group_by(port, date) %>%
  summarise(count_distinct_vessels = n_distinct(vessel_id)) %>%
  ungroup()
`summarise()` has grouped output by 'port'. You can override using the
`.groups` argument.
agg_data_vessel <- complete_grid_vessel %>%
  left_join(agg_data_vessel, by = c("date", "port")) %>%
  replace_na(list(count_distinct_vessels = 0))

agg_data_vessel <- agg_data_vessel %>%
  mutate(month = month(date, label = TRUE, abbr = TRUE),
         day = day(date),
         weekday = wday(date, label = TRUE, abbr = TRUE, week_start = 7))

# Prepare Cargo Quantity Data
ping_activity$start_time <- ymd_hms(ping_activity$start_time)
Warning: 1771 failed to parse.
ping_activity$month <- floor_date(ping_activity$start_time, "month")

ping_activity$month <- as.Date(ping_activity$month)

agg_data <- ping_activity %>%
  group_by(area, vessel_id, month) %>%
  summarise(median_dwell = median(dwell, na.rm = TRUE)) %>%
  ungroup()
`summarise()` has grouped output by 'area', 'vessel_id'. You can override using
the `.groups` argument.
nearest_tx_date$tx_date <- as.Date(nearest_tx_date$tx_date)
nearest_tx_date$month <- format(nearest_tx_date$tx_date, "%m")

# Define UI for the application
shinyApp(ui <- fluidPage(
  titlePanel("Interactive Calendar Heatmap"),
  
  fluidRow(
    column(12,  # Full width for the tabset panel
      tabsetPanel(
        tabPanel("Calendar Map of Cargo Count",
          sidebarLayout(
            sidebarPanel(
              selectInput("city_cargo", "Select City:", choices = unique(agg_data_cargo$dest), 
                          selected = c("City of Haacklee", "City of Lomark", "City of South Paackland"), multiple = TRUE)
            ),
            
            mainPanel(
              plotlyOutput("calendarHeatmapCargo", height = "1200px")
            )
          )
        ),
        tabPanel("Calendar Map of Vessel Count",
          sidebarLayout(
            sidebarPanel(
              selectInput("city_vessel", "Select City:", choices = unique(agg_data_vessel$port), 
                          selected = c("City of Haacklee", "City of Lomark", "City of South Paackland"), 
                          multiple = TRUE)
            ),
            
            mainPanel(
              plotlyOutput("calendarHeatmapVessel", height = "1200px")
            )
          )
        ),
        tabPanel("Distribution of Cargo Quantity by Month",
          sidebarLayout(
            sidebarPanel(
              selectInput("fish_species", "Select Fish Species:", 
                          choices = c("All", unique(nearest_tx_date$fish_species)),
                          selected = "All",
                          multiple = TRUE),
              selectInput("vessel_id", "Select Vessel ID to Highlight:", 
                          choices = unique(nearest_tx_date$vessel_id),
                          selected = NULL,
                          multiple = TRUE),
              selectInput("dest", "Select Destination:", 
                          choices = c("All", unique(nearest_tx_date$dest)),
                          selected = "All",
                          multiple = TRUE)
            ),
            
            mainPanel(
              uiOutput("plots"),
              DTOutput("summary_table")
            )
          )
        ),
        tabPanel("Distribution of Dwell Time per Area",
          sidebarLayout(
            sidebarPanel(
              selectInput("selected_area", "Select Area(s):", 
                          choices = c("All", unique(ping_activity$area)), 
                          selected = c("Ghoti Preserve", "Nemo Reef", "Don Limpet Preserve"), 
                          multiple = TRUE),
              selectInput("exclude_vessel", "Exclude Vessel ID(s):", 
                          choices = unique(ping_activity$vessel_id), 
                          selected = "heartofoceanusf11", 
                          multiple = TRUE),
              selectInput("highlight_vessel", "Highlight Vessel ID(s):", 
                          choices = unique(ping_activity$vessel_id), 
                          selected = c("gurnardgrabberd9a", "oceanoracle1d0"), 
                          multiple = TRUE)
            ),
            
            mainPanel(
              uiOutput("dwell_time_plots")
            )
          )
        )
      )
    )
  )
), 

# Define server logic
server <- function(input, output) {
  output$calendarHeatmapCargo <- renderPlotly({
    filtered_data <- agg_data_cargo %>%
      filter(dest %in% input$city_cargo)
    
    color_palette <- c("white", colorRampPalette(c("lightgreen", "darkgreen"))(20))
    
    fill_scale <- scale_fill_manual(values = color_palette, name = "Count of Distinct Cargo IDs", na.value = "white")
    
    p <- ggplot(filtered_data, aes(x = weekday, y = interaction(month, week), fill = factor(count_distinct_cargo))) +
      geom_tile(color = "white", size = 0.5, na.rm = FALSE) +
      fill_scale +
      facet_wrap(~dest, scales = "free_y", nrow = 1) +
      labs(title = "Calendar Heatmap of Distinct Cargo Counts per City for 2035 (Feb to Nov)", x = "Day of Week", y = "Month and Week") +
      theme_minimal() +
      theme(panel.grid.major = element_line(color = "grey", size = 0.5),
            panel.grid.minor = element_line(color = "grey", size = 0.5),
            axis.text.y = element_text(size = 6),
            axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 90, hjust = 1))
    
    ggplotly(p)
  })
  
  output$calendarHeatmapVessel <- renderPlotly({
    filtered_data <- agg_data_vessel %>%
      filter(port %in% input$city_vessel)
    
    color_palette <- c("white", colorRampPalette(c("lightblue", "darkblue"))(20))
    
    fill_scale <- scale_fill_manual(values = color_palette, name = "Count of Distinct Vessel IDs", na.value = "white")
    
    p <- ggplot(filtered_data, aes(x = weekday, y = month, fill = factor(count_distinct_vessels), text = paste("Date: ", date, "<br>Count: ", count_distinct_vessels))) +
      geom_tile(color = "white", size = 0.5, na.rm = FALSE) +
      fill_scale +
      facet_wrap(~port, scales = "free_y", nrow = 1) +
      labs(title = "Calendar Heatmap of Distinct Vessel Counts per City for 2035 (Feb to Nov)", x = "Day of Week", y = "Month") +
      theme_minimal() +
      theme(panel.grid.major = element_line(color = "grey", size = 0.5),
            panel.grid.minor = element_line(color = "grey", size = 0.5),
            axis.text.y = element_text(size = 10),
            axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 90, hjust = 1))
    
    ggplotly(p, tooltip = "text")
  })
  
  output$plots <- renderUI({
    selected_dests <- if("All" %in% input$dest) unique(nearest_tx_date$dest) else input$dest
    selected_species <- if("All" %in% input$fish_species) unique(nearest_tx_date$fish_species) else input$fish_species
    
    if ("All" %in% input$dest & "All" %in% input$fish_species) {
      plot_output_list <- list(plotlyOutput("plot_aggregate"))
    } else {
      plot_output_list <- lapply(selected_dests, function(destination) {
        plot_output_sublist <- lapply(selected_species, function(species) {
          plotlyOutput(paste0("plot_", destination, "_", species))
        })
        do.call(tagList, plot_output_sublist)
      })
    }
    do.call(tagList, plot_output_list)
  })
  
  output$plot_aggregate <- renderPlotly({
    tryCatch({
      filtered_data <- nearest_tx_date %>% 
        filter(fish_species %in% unique(nearest_tx_date$fish_species), 
               dest %in% unique(nearest_tx_date$dest))
      
      filtered_data$color <- ifelse(filtered_data$vessel_id %in% input$vessel_id, "red", "blue")
      
      p <- ggplot(filtered_data, aes(x = month, y = qty_tons)) +
        geom_jitter(aes(color = color, text = vessel_id), width = 0.4, alpha = 0.3, size = 1) +
        geom_boxplot(alpha = 0.6, outlier.shape = NA) +
        labs(title = "Aggregate Cargo Weight Across All Fish Species and Destinations",
             x = "Month", y = "Quantity in Tons") +
        scale_color_identity()
      
      ggplotly(p, tooltip = "text")
    }, error = function(e) {
      renderText("No Plot Available")
    })
  })
  
  lapply(unique(nearest_tx_date$dest), function(destination) {
    lapply(unique(nearest_tx_date$fish_species), function(species) {
      output[[paste0("plot_", destination, "_", species)]] <- renderPlotly({
        selected_dests <- if("All" %in% input$dest) unique(nearest_tx_date$dest) else input$dest
        selected_species <- if("All" %in% input$fish_species) unique(nearest_tx_date$fish_species) else input$fish_species
        if (!(species %in% selected_species) || !(destination %in% selected_dests)) return(NULL)
        
        tryCatch({
          filtered_data <- nearest_tx_date %>% 
            filter(fish_species == species, dest == destination)
          
          filtered_data$color <- ifelse(filtered_data$vessel_id %in% input$vessel_id, "red", "blue")
          
          p <- ggplot(filtered_data, aes(x = month, y = qty_tons)) +
            geom_jitter(aes(color = color, text = vessel_id), width = 0.4, alpha = 0.3, size = 1) +
            geom_boxplot(alpha = 0.6, outlier.shape = NA) +
            labs(title = paste("Cargo Weight for", species, "at", destination),
                 x = "Month", y = "Quantity in Tons") +
            scale_color_identity()
          
          ggplotly(p, tooltip = "text")
        }, error = function(e) {
          renderText("No Plot Available")
        })
      })
    })
  })
  
  output$summary_table <- renderDT({
    selected_dests <- if("All" %in% input$dest) unique(nearest_tx_date$dest) else input$dest
    selected_species <- if("All" %in% input$fish_species) unique(nearest_tx_date$fish_species) else input$fish_species
    
    filtered_data <- nearest_tx_date %>% 
      filter(fish_species %in% selected_species, dest %in% selected_dests)
    
    summary_stats <- filtered_data %>%
      group_by(month) %>%
      summarize(
        upper_limit = quantile(qty_tons, 0.9)
      )
    
    filtered_data <- filtered_data %>%
      left_join(summary_stats, by = "month")
    
    exceeding_data <- filtered_data %>%
      filter(qty_tons > upper_limit)
    
    frequency_data <- exceeding_data %>%
      group_by(vessel_id) %>%
      summarize(frequency = n()) %>%
      arrange(desc(frequency))
    
    datatable(frequency_data, options = list(pageLength = 5))
  })
  
  filtered_dwell_data <- reactive({
    data <- agg_data %>% 
      filter(!vessel_id %in% input$exclude_vessel,
             if ("All" %in% input$selected_area) TRUE else area %in% input$selected_area)
    data
  })
  
  output$dwell_time_plots <- renderUI({
    areas <- if ("All" %in% input$selected_area) unique(ping_activity$area) else input$selected_area
    plot_list <- lapply(areas, function(area) {
      plotlyOutput(outputId = paste0("plot_", gsub(" ", "_", area)), height = 300)
    })
    do.call(tagList, plot_list)
  })
  
  observeEvent(filtered_dwell_data(), {
    areas <- if ("All" %in% input$selected_area) unique(ping_activity$area) else input$selected_area
    lapply(areas, function(area) {
      area_data <- filtered_dwell_data() %>% filter(area == area)
      
      output[[paste0("plot_", gsub(" ", "_", area))]] <- renderPlotly({
        p <- ggplot(area_data, aes(x = month, y = median_dwell, text = vessel_id)) +
          geom_boxplot(outlier.shape = NA) +
          geom_jitter(data = area_data %>% filter(vessel_id %in% input$highlight_vessel), 
                      aes(group = vessel_id), width = 0.2, color = "red", alpha = 0.5, size = 1.5) +
          geom_jitter(data = area_data %>% filter(!vessel_id %in% input$highlight_vessel), 
                      aes(group = vessel_id), width = 0.2, color = "blue", alpha = 0.5, size = 1.5) +
          labs(title = area,
               x = "Month",
               y = "Median Dwell Time") +
          scale_x_date(date_labels = "%b", date_breaks = "1 month") +
          theme_minimal() +
          theme(legend.position = "none")
        ggplotly(p, tooltip = "text")
      })
    })
  })
})
